title: Trover Saves the Universe Free Download
description:
Trover Saves the Universe Download PC Game In Direct Link for free on SteamRIP
Your dogs have been dognapped by a beaked lunatic named Glorkon who stuffed them into his eye holes and is using their life essence to destroy the universe. You’re partnered with Trover, a little purple eye-hole monster who isn’t a huge fan of working or being put in the position of having to save the universe .
He’s also not that big a fan of you quite frankly, and neither am I. (Jk, you’re great) Only you and Trover can save everything in this bizarre comedy adventure, created by Justin Roiland

system_requirements.Processor: Intel Core i5-2400/AMD FX-8320 or better
system_requirements.Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 670 2GB/AMD Radeon HD 7870 2GB or better
